WorkTypeCodeSetBundle.name: WorkTypeCodeSetBundle
WorkTypeCodeSetBundle.description: Represents a relationship between visit type (Work Type) and code set bundles that represent the service and appointment details for the visit type.

AppointmentTypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of appointment associated with the visit type (work type) and service.

FlowName.description: The name of the internal flow that's invoked when the visit type (work type) is selected.

HasPrerequisitesCheckInFlow.description: Indicates whether the flow associated with the work type code set bundle checks prerequisites (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the WorkTypeCodeSetBundle record.

ParentId.description: The parent visit type (work type) that the code sets for service and appointment details are associated with. The value for this field is unique across your org in records. That means you canâ€™t have multiple WorkTypeCodeSetBundle records for the same WorkType record.

SchedulingSystem.description: Specifies the scheduling system that's used to schedule an appointment.

ServiceCategoryId.description: The system-defined code that represents the category of service associated with the visit type (Work Type).

ServiceTypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of service associated with the visit type (Work Type).
